title: Barbra Streisand, Céline Dion - Tell Him (Official Remastered HD Video)
description:

LYRICS:

I’m scared
So afraid to show I care
Will he think me weak
If I tremble when I speak
Oooh, what if
There’s another one he’s thinking of
Maybe he’s in love
I’d feel like a fool
Life can be so cruel
I don’t know what to do

I’ve been there
With my heart out in my hand
But what you must understand
You can’t let the chance
To love him pass you by

Tell him
Tell him that the sun and moon
Rise in his eyes
Reach out to him
And whisper
Tender words so soft and sweet
I’ll hold him close to feel his heart beat
Love will be the gift you give yourself

Touch him
With the gentleness you feel inside
I feel it
Your love can’t be denied
The truth will set you free
You’ll have what’s meant to be
All in time you’ll see

Oooh, I love him
Then show him
Of that much I can be sure
Hold him close to you
I don’t think I could endure
If I let him walk away
When I have so much to say
Tell him
Tell him that the sun and moon
Rise in his eyes
Reach out to him
And whisper
Tender words so soft and sweet
Hold him close to feel his heart beat
Love will be the gift you give yourself

Love is light that surely glows
In the hearts of those who know
It’s a steady flame that grows
Feed the fire with all the passion you can show
Tonight love will assume its place
This memory time cannot erase
Your faith will lead love where it has to go

Tell him
Tell him that the sun and moon
Rise in his eyes
Reach out to him
And whisper
Whisper words so soft and sweet
Hold him close to feel his heart beat
Love will be the gift you give yourself
Never let him go 

#CelineDion #TellHim #BarbraStreisand #LetsTalkAboutLove #Pop

new_description:
About the Song: "Tell Him" by Barbra Streisand and Céline Dion

"Tell Him" is an iconic duet performed by Barbra Streisand and Céline Dion, released in 1997. The song appears on Streisand's album "Higher Ground" and Dion's album "Let's Talk About Love." It stands out as an emotionally charged ballad that showcases the vocal prowess and heartfelt delivery of two legendary singers.

The Collaboration

The collaboration between Barbra Streisand and Céline Dion was a momentous event in the music world. Both artists are renowned for their powerful voices and have huge fanbases worldwide. The idea of bringing them together to perform a duet was inspired by their mutual admiration for each other, and "Tell Him" became a perfect embodiment of their musical synergy. The song was composed by Walter Afanasieff, Ronny Ching, and David Foster, three maestros known for crafting profound melodies.

Lyrics and Theme

The lyrics of "Tell Him" express themes of love, vulnerability, and the courage to express one's feelings. The song's narrative revolves around the advice of one woman to another, urging her to confess her love to her beloved before it's too late. Words are crafted meticulously to depict the emotional turmoil of silently loving someone and the liberating feeling of sharing one's true emotions.

Verses like "Tell him that the sun and moon rise in his eyes" and "Love will be the gift you give yourself" are poignant and evocative, encapsulating the song's depth and sincerity. The emotional potency of the lyrics is further amplified by Streisand and Dion's performances, their voices blending seamlessly to deliver a message of love and empowerment.

Impact and Reception

Upon its release, "Tell Him" enjoyed significant success. It charted in several countries, reaching the top ten in places like Norway, the Netherlands, and Ireland. In the US, it received substantial airplay and became an adult contemporary hit. The song's music video, directed by Scott Lochmus, further amplified its popularity. It beautifully captures the emotions portrayed in the song, with Streisand and Dion each delivering their parts with their characteristic grace and vocal excellence.

Remastered Video Release

The official remastered HD video for "Tell Him" brings a new level of visual clarity to this classic, allowing fans to experience the song in heightened quality. The upgraded visuals present a fresh take on the original video, making it a treat for both long-time fans and new listeners. This remastered version is part of an effort to preserve and celebrate timeless music works in modern formats.

Artists' Legacy

Barbra Streisand and Céline Dion are artists who have shaped the music industry and influenced countless musicians worldwide. Streisand, with a career spanning several decades, is not only a singer but also an actress and filmmaker. Her contributions to the arts are unparalleled, and her influence is seen in many areas of entertainment.

Céline Dion, on the other hand, is known for her powerful ballads and captivating stage presence. Her voice has become synonymous with emotive and effective storytelling through music. Dion's impact is far-reaching, with numerous awards and honors recognizing her contribution to music.

"Tell Him" stands as a testament to their exceptional talent and their ability to move audiences through music. The remastered HD video is a beautiful homage to this memorable duet, ensuring its continuing relevance in today's music landscape.

A Timeless Duet

"Tell Him" remains an everlasting piece in the landscape of pop music. Its timeless message and the unparalleled performances by Barbra Streisand and Céline Dion continue to resonate with listeners around the globe. The song's lyrical content and emotive delivery encapsulate themes that are universal and deeply human, making it a perpetual favorite.

Through this remastered video, the legacy of "Tell Him" is preserved for future generations, allowing them to experience the magic and emotion that this collaboration brought into the world. Whether you're discovering it for the first time or revisiting a beloved classic, "Tell Him" remains an exemplary piece of artistry signifying the heights achievable when two legendary talents join forces.
